subject: Re: dave's files
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
I'm going to have to side with Bruce on this, the files posted so far 
don't really seem to be EVP's.  You can hear a lot of shuffling around 
and natural man-made noises in the background.  I would never knock 
anybody else's research, but i've heard a lot of Evp and these don't 
seem to be Evp's.  Even bad evp's are barely audible and can say 
several different things depending on the listener.  If you want bruce 
and i could send you some real Evp's done with a simple recorder so 
you know what to listen for.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey Dave,
> 
> I'm sorry but I do not hear anything in those files.
> are you new to evp ? if so let me know and I will help get you on 
the 
> right track.
> 
> e-mail me paranormalinvestigating@...
> 
> bruce
>
